value.title: Self-Driving Teams Have Always Strived To Measure Safety. What If That’s Not The Hard Thing?
value.excerpt: Since the first dream of self-driving, there has always been a sharp focus (including from myself) on safety. The ability to reduce accidents is the grandest purpose of these projects, and every team declares that safety is at the core of everything they do.

value.title: CEO Robin Li fast-tracks smart EV development to harness Baidu’s AI tech and mount a challenge to Tesla
value.excerpt: The tech giant is hoping to harness its AI tech as it builds an EV presence, in a market where electrification and digitalisation are redrawing the landscape.

value.title: Hacker shows what Tesla Full Self-Driving’s vision depth perception neural net can see
value.excerpt: A hacker managed to pull Tesla’s vision depth perception neural net from his car with “Full Self-Driving” package. You can see how the vehicle detects depth with a point-cloud view powered ...

value.title: If McDonald’s Is Rolling Out A Customer Loyalty Program, So Should AI Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Customer loyalty programs are pervasive, though surprisingly McDonald's is just now rolling out their nationwide program. This brings up the aspect that AI-based true self-driving cars ought to have loyalty programs for riders,

value.title: Yandex Self-Driving Group partners with GrubHub to bring robotic delivery to college campuses
value.excerpt: Yandex Self-Driving Group, a unit of Yandex, the publicly-traded Russian tech giant, has announced a partnership with food delivery service GrubHub to be its multi-year robotic delivery provider across American college campuses.

value.title: Elon Musk: Tesla to release new UI with ‘mind of car’ view coming to cars with FSD computer
value.excerpt: Elon Musk: has confirmed that Tesla will release a new user interface with its upcoming FSD v9 Beta software update. The updated UI will have something that the CEO referred to as “mind of car’ view.

value.title: Developing safe self-driving car a 'hard problem', admits Tesla CEO Musk
value.excerpt: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has finally admitted that developing a safe and reliable self-driving car is indeed a difficult task

value.title: Tesla’s AI chief: Self-driving cars don’t need LiDAR
value.excerpt: Tesla has been a vocal champion for the pure vision-based approach to autonomous driving, its chief AI scientist Andrej Karpathy explained why.

value.title: The lessons we learn from self-driving will drive our robotics future

value.title: Cheers to the Heineken B.O.T. Self-Driving Beer Delivery Robot
value.excerpt: You could train your dog to grab one for you, which would take effort, time, and commitment. Or you could turn to Heineken's new B.O.T., which is, yep, a beer-carrying robot that brings the beers to you.

value.title: Lip-Reading By AI Self-Driving Cars Is Either Alarming Or Ingenious
value.excerpt: Advances in AI have enabled new apps for doing lip-reading, which could be a feature included into self-driving cars, alarmingly so or perhaps ingeniously.

value.title: Tesla Vision-powered active safety features found to be at least as good as with radar in new test
value.excerpt: Tesla’s active safety features powered by its new Tesla Vision computer vision system without radar are proving to be at least as good as with radar in a new independent test. When Tesla announced the transition to its “Tesla Vision” Autopilot without radar,

value.title: NHTSA mandates crash reports for self-driving cars, driver-assist systems
value.excerpt: If a vehicle equipped with a system like Tesla's Autopilot or GM's Super Cruise is involved in a crash, the agency must get a report within 24 hours.

value.title: Here’s what a trend-analyzing A.I. thinks will be the next big thing in tech
value.excerpt: The "technology intelligence engine" uses A.I. to sift through hundreds of millions of documents online, then uses all that information to spot trends.

value.title: The Absurdity And Misleading Baloney About AI Self-Driving Cars That Will Be Uncrashable
value.excerpt: There are those claiming that self-driving cars will be uncrashable, which sounds nifty, but it is nonsensical and worse still it sets false expectations of what self-driving cars will be able to do.

value.title: Tesla Full Self-Driving v9 beta update slips to next week, monthly subscription model follows
value.excerpt: Elon Musk is again updating the timeline for Tesla’s new Full Self-Driving v9 beta update, which is apparently now slipping to next week. Tesla’s new FSD subscription model should follow at the same time.

value.title: Self-driving truck maker Embark to go public via $4.6 bln SPAC deal
value.excerpt: Embark Trucks Inc, a self-driving truck developer backed by private equity firm Tiger Global Management, said it had agreed to go public through a merger with blank-check firm Northern Genesis Acquisition Corp.
